BLUE RIDGE HEALTHCARE HOSPITALS, INC. d/b/a Carolinas Healthcare System - Blue Ridge, Petitioner
v.
NC DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES, DIVISION OF HEALTH SERVICE REGULATION, HEALTHCARE PLANNING AND CERTIFICATE OF NEED SECTION, Respondent
and
Caldwell Memorial Hospital, Inc. and SCSV, LLC, Respondent-Intervenors No. 361P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2017 Maureen D. Murray, Attorney at Law, Carrie A. Hanger, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Matthew N. Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Terrill Johnson Harris, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Elizabeth Brooks Scherer, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Blue Ridge Healthcare Hospitals, Inc. d/b/a Carolinas Healthcare System-Blue Ridge. Jill A. Bryan, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, June S. Ferrell, Special Deputy Attorney General, for N.C. Department of Health and Human Services, Division of Health Service Regulation, Healthcare Planning and Certificate of Need Section. Joy Heath, Attorney at Law, Ruth A. Levy, Attorney at Law, Elizabeth D. Scott, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Caldwell Memorial Hospital, Inc., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 24th of October 2017 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2017."
